about_the_game:
This is a challenging pixel-art style adventure game full of strategy. In this mysterious and adventurous world, you will play as a brave adventurer, traversing through multiple levels. You can purchase powerful equipment from the shop and experiment with different combinations to defeat bosses, ultimately achieving a staggering 70 trillion output.

Game Features:
Exquisite pixel-art style visuals: Classic pixel art style that brings back nostalgic gaming memories.

Equipment combination strategy: Hundreds of different weapons and armor can be purchased from the shop. Mix and match freely to create the best battle strategy for you.

Gameplay:
Adventure through levels: Deploy heroes from your lineup, defeat enemies, and collect loot.

Purchase equipment from the shop: Buy various equipment from the shop and flexibly match them according to different lineups to devise the best strategy.

Strategic battles: Each boss has unique debuffs. Choose suitable equipment or strategies to defeat them in the most effective way.

Incremental output improvement: Improve your output capability by continuously challenging yourself and optimizing equipment combinations, aiming towards the astonishing goal of 70 trillion output.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7，8，9，10，11
  • Processor: x64 or x86
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • VR Support: 不支持
  • Additional Notes: 无

short_description: A strategic pixel-style dungeon-crawling game where you can purchase hundreds of different weapons and armors in the shop, mix and match freely to create the best battle strategy for you, enhance your output capability, defeat bosses, and strive towards the astonishing goal of 70 trillion output.
supported_languages: English, French, Russian, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese
